website_summaries.verdict: This fun and innovative couples costume set will be the hit of the party.
pros: A big hit, particularly with older crowds
Great looking and fun costume set that comes with a painting dress, as well as a wig, beard, palette, and paint brush for whoever is trying their hand at painting lots and lots of little trees
cons: Set is on the expensive side considering what you get

customer_reviews.title: Bob Ross & His Painting
customer_reviews.text: Happy Trees! For $90.00, this costume set was a little pricy but really cute. Included is a large paint palette & paintbrush, wig, beard, and a dress painting. The dress fits sizes 4-10 & definitely did not look as large on me as pictured. I added a red and orange wig to represent the sun, and my husband picked up his shirt at the thrift store. Great quality items. Fun couples costume.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Great for costumes
customer_reviews.text: Worked and looked great, the beard wasn’t itchy or irritating, the painting does not stay square when you put your arms down though.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Martin

customer_reviews.title: Costume was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! Only downside of the dress is you had to have your arms out in order to see the full canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good costume
customer_reviews.text: Dress is a med fit. Beard and wig are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, even came with a paint brush. Highly recommend next time you're looking for a couples costume.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Spreen

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Beard is itchy but wig fits great. The canvas needed to be let out but we won best couple
customer_reviews.author: Natasha  Bittinger

customer_reviews.title: Smock is nice, Wig & Beard need help!
customer_reviews.text: The women's smock dress is very nice and comfortable, however the man's wig and beard piece is poor quality and not realistic. Both the beard and the wig need trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect costume for couples/pairs
customer_reviews.text: This costume was perfect. The “painting” is a slip-on dress/stretchy shirt and looked GREAT! The wig was bushy-perfect. We received so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for what you get. The painting dress is not washable, so it may be a one-time wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Lancat

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BOB ROSS WILL GET ATTENTION
customer_reviews.text: The painting will not, ladies. Just a heads up. Anyways, it was cute and friends loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Reema

product_meta.title: Bob Ross Artist Couples Costume Bundle Set
feature_bullets: Officially Licensed Rasta Imposta Bob Ross costume.
Includes a pullover tunic dress (fits sizes 4-10), and wig, beard, paint palette, and paintbrush.
Material is 100% polyester, spot clean only, do not iron.
Creative and unique couples costume. Bring happy little trees, little fluffy clouds, and the joy of painting to your next party.
Shirt, pants, and shoes not included.
